org.jboss.jdeparser

Interface JCommentable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JAnonymousClassDef, JAssignableExpr, JBlock, JCatch, JClassDef, JDocCommentable, JEnumConstant, JFor, JIf, JMethodDef, JPackageInfoFile, JSourceFile, JStatement, JSwitch, JTry, JVarDeclaration

    public interface JCommentable
    A program element which can have comments attached to it.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd
